decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (URB UB [08] 00 02 Rev D00, URB UB [08] 80 01 Rev D00, URB UB [08] 20 01 Rev D00, URB UB [08] 00 04 Rev D00, URB UB [08] 70 01 Rev D00, design and access statement, SO3290, URB UB [08] 00 03 Rev D00, URB UB [08] 20 02 Rev D00, URB UB [08] 00 05 Rev D00, 7231/M/01 Rev C, URB UB [08] 70 02 Rev D00, URB UB [08] 00 01 Rev D00. Received: 22nd April 2016.
Sequential assessment. Received: 29th June 2016 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 4 - Before the hereby approved A3 use is first commenced details shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority for the provision of cycle parking to be provided for the A3 use and shall include the size, type and location of such.

Condition : 5 - The use hereby permitted shall not be begun until details of the arrangements for storing of waste and recycled materials have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The arrangements for storing waste and recycled materials shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.
description: External alterations to include two new entrances, new glazing and entrance surrounds and change of use of part of unit from Leisure facility (D2) to Restaurant (A3) including outdoor seating area and associated plant enclosures.
